review_text: Beautiful, charming old house in a nice, quiet neighborhood.

Initially the first few days were a challenge because of the heating. However, once that issue was addressed, due to the owners response our stay was amazing. My family and I had a wonderful stay at this home. Made our Christmas very memorable and I would definitely recommend this place to anyone.
It was a really cute space. Hosts were friendly and communicated very well.
The place was clean and very unique. It was a nice stay overall.

We felt right at home here! The house was well kept and had everything we needed to feel right at home during our stay. As the listing described- the house was drafty and cold downstairs, but upstairs was very comfortable even on cold nights. The host was accommodating for our corgi that tagged along for the trip.
All was good!
Great hosts and home. Highly recommend.
Very interesting house, English Tudor style. We really enjoyed it, very cozy, everything we needed was at hand. Peaceful, quiet area. Highly recommended -
Super charming home! All the historic features are super cool, and very well renovated. Very clean and had everything we needed. Loved our stay!
Throughly enjoyed our second stay. Location is convenient to everything we needed. Property is beautiful and house is very comfortable.

First I would like thank you both.
The house was everything we expected. The property somewhat secluded or feels that way due to the beautiful landscaping. With that said if you arrive at night it feels a little uneasy as it’s dark and not a lot of surrounding light. In the morning you will enjoy the location and the surroundings as birds chirp and you hear the wind in the tall trees. We stayed due to attending DREAMVILLE. It’s 30/40 minutes from event location. My two kids 16&20 and myself had a blast.
Thank you

OK, so I had a special circumstance. First of all, and most importantly, the home is absolutely beautiful. They really went out of their way to make it a gorgeous space!
I went out there on my own to get away and have some rest and relaxation.
Unfortunately, I had to deal with a gas leak three days in a row. I am sure that this will be resolved now that I am gone, BUT I was told that the issue was known prior to my visit, by a maintenance man.
They were kind enough to give me $50 toward a meal one evening, but now our entire vacation budget is gone and there was a little to no relaxation.
It really was the extreme of good and bad. The home is perfect and I loved it. However, it was extremely expensive and I was unable to relax the entire time. If it was my home, I would not have charged the occupant based on the fact that The trip was completely affected by some thing that was my responsibility.
Once that is fixed, the home is perfect

The home is beautifully appointed in a quiet, private location, and is a classic Tudor style home with many original stones, cast iron windows, and other antique finishes - yet has been completely modernized with new kitchen and bathrooms. There was a problem with the dishwasher, but Kevin & Tina were open and communicated with us to alleviate the issue, and we were satisfied with their response. Otherwise we had a fabulous stay there, and highly recommend this home if you are in the vicinity - Tobacco Road is right down the street! We will be back when we visit again.

Private and peaceful! Perfect for a quick weekend getaway - this home is charming and unique, updated in all the ways that matter without taking away from the historic vibe. A great mix between modern comforts and the coziness of a Tudor home in the woods! Very clean and comfortable.

Beautiful and peaceful location. The entry and house look exactly like the photos. The house is old and charming in all the right ways. It was very cold when we were there and despite the traditional windows we were still comfortable in the home. The location was ideal as it’s very close to the downtown Sanford restaurants. We were there for a memorial service and many of my family members had houses so far away that they chose not to come into town. We were able to get an Uber back to this house even.
There are a few quirks,ie bathroom doors that might not fully lock, tiny powder room downstairs, creaky floors but all of this adds to the charm and the modern amenities in the kitchen, and the spacious main bathroom with an amazing shower where more than adequate for us and our teenage daughters. We would definitely stay here again.
Rustic, charming and beautiful! I will definitely return!

Thank you Kevin and Tina for allowing us to stay in your home. It was amazing, beautiful and had everything we needed during our stay. It was clean, the beds were comfortable, and the location was so peaceful. My family and I really enjoyed our stay and just wished we were able to stay longer if we could. This home was also pet friendly and it just felt like home. Everything was near by as well especially the park where we enjoyed our hike. We will definitely be back again soon.

We stayed here for over two weeks while we were waiting to close on our new home. Although the downstairs was quite chilly on the colder days, the decor and functionality of the home far outweighed the heat issue. We felt very comfortable staying here for an extended period of time. We were traveling with our small dog so the fenced in back yard was a plus!
Overall, great property!
highly recommend for a quiet weekend amongst some beautiful trees. we really enjoyed our stay and wouldn’t change a thing about it.

Beautiful place to stay with decor that was thoughtfully designed. Enjoyed the small wildlife and property that is full of trees and flowers. Loved the front 4-season porch. The water pressure was great, making the rainfall shower an experience of awesomeness. Had everything I needed plus more! Thank you! Would stay here again for sure.
Great house. Hosts are such nice people and so easy to deal with. Highly recommend this house. Great location and easy to get to downtown and good restaurants.

wonderful
place!
great sleep!
This is a beautiful home with so much character. It’s on a private lot with lots of trees and a great screened in porch. Plus, the beds are super comfortable. Thanks for a great stay!
We have stayed at this tutor several times. This is a true gem. We do not build homes like this one anymore. Great house and hosts!
Beautiful property, quiet and private home in a nice neighborhood. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay!
Very nice place! Comfortable beds.
This is a classic Tudor that has been fully remodeled in an authentic way. It is a really cool house surrounded by big pines. The kitchen is high end and the bathroom has a great shower.
We had a great stay! The house was beautiful and the surrounding area was fun to explore. There is a train nearby so expect to hear some train noises throughout your stay.
We had a wonderful time at this beautiful and unique home. Beautiful furnishings and very comfortable beds.

Everything was up to par and I really loved everything but it was only one tv which was in the living room. You also had to pay for the main channels so if you want to watch anything bring a fire stick.

The house was so adorable with well-appointed design, quiet and peaceful. An unfortunate incident, before we arrived, left the kitchen with a few items wanting (we sent owners notes about baking sheets, mixing bowls, items to bake in oven, hopefully replaced), the owners weren’t able to address the dishwasher not working issue while we were there for 2 weekend days (it wouldn’t latch in order to start). They did make amends for the inconveniences. We loved the location, overall the house and peaceful atmosphere.
Very clean house everything we expected from the page, and great host!!
Great spot in Sanford. Clean, bright, good-sized apartment, and lived up to the pictures perfectly.

The location of the apartment is great. Downtown Sanford is beautiful, loved walking around the town meeting the different shop owners. Restaurants are within a 2-3 minute walk with a great selection. Apartment was just as the pictures showed, spotless. Would definitely stay there again if we are back up that way.
As before, great time and love the Pub/Restauant downstairs!! Looking forward to our next visit!

Jeff,
We want to reserve for the same event at Deep River for next year. I hope by then you will have more units for our co workers. We could use , including us, three units.
We had dinner with Ed Strickland Sunday night. Says he know you.
best
Kirby
Thanks Jeff! I enjoyed my stay, slept well and felt right at home!
Had a great time here and the place was really nice. Would stay here again!!!
Great place to stay
Gem and close to essentials-BBQ, wine, coffee, delicious cookies. Will return!

We had a wonderful stay in Sanford. The apartment was just as listed, convenient and comfortable. We had a relaxing walk to the coffee shop each morning and wonderful food and entertainment downstairs on Friday and Saturday night.
Great place to stay, nice every time
Jeff is amazing host and easy to work with. Location was everything!!!
Great stay, great location
Great place!
The apartment is very spacious. Clean, quiet and convenient to restaurants.
Great location, nice and clean with no surprises. Glad I chose it.
Great spot in a great location.
Awesome location, beautiful and comfortable space, and great price. Perfect for our trip.

Great place to stay.
Would stay there anytime we were in Sanford

The apartment is spacious and beautiful. Unfortunately it is directly over a bar which had a band playing on Friday night. The floors were shaking so definitely no sleeping. When I messaged Jeff regarding the issue I never received a response. Too bad because the apartment itself is very nice.

Beautiful industrial apartment, great views of the downtown area. In walking distance of several restaurants and local shopping. Great if you are looking for some time away. My only heads up would be if you are a light sleeper as there can be road noise and the beautiful train runs all night. The bedroom is located in the back to help filter out and prevent as much noise as possible. The host is wonderful and did check to make sure everything went well and gave local recommendations.
Had an awesome time seeing some family. Enjoyed the downtown area. Really nice. Jeff is a good host. Will definitely stay again when we can plan another trip back.

The rental apartment was larger than the photos appeared. It was amazingly spacious.
Booked this for my mom who was visiting us to have a belated holiday get together. The location is great with restaurants, coffee shop, and a brewery in walking distance.
Location, location, location…. Awesome spot right in downtown close to restaurants, etc. Will be staying again next time I’m passing through for work.
Comfortable, charming place smack in the middle of all the fun places in Sanford . Perfect way to close out a busy day.
Great host & great stay

Absolutely loved my staycation at Jeff’s place! The bed and sheets were super soft and comfortable! It was the perfect place to just get away from the everyday hustle and bustle of life. I loved the downtown feel of eating in and sitting at the huge windows to watch the downtown life! Would def stay here again ❤️

It’s exactly as described nice very easy check in, street parking is limited hours but free parking available right behind building we spent New Years weekend here very quiet. Nice dinner bar right downstairs enjoyed the atmosphere there lots of shops on street. Great place with all the necessary amenities. Loved it
Very relaxing for the perfect getaway.
Jeff was a great host and the place was great. Exactly what I needed for my weekend stay. You can tell he takes great care of the condo.
Great place to stay in sanford
Clean, in the heart of the city, modern, infant friendly, spacious….. literally perfect! There’s nothing bad to say! When we come to Sanford, this is where we are staying!
Jeff was very responsive and answered any questions I asked. His place matched the photos and description. It was perfect while traveling alone to attend a family event.

We were just in for a quick overnight while traveling but had a great stay here! The apartment itself is beautiful; we especially loved the huge windows in the living room. Bedroom is dark and quiet with a comfortable bed. Parking was easy, and the apartment location is near local restaurants, stores etc. We’d definitely stay here again if back in the area!
This is a repeat visit and the apartment was spotless, comfortable and easy to find. We would repeat a stay here in the future.
Very cool and big apartment in the heart of downtown. Walkable to breweries and a coffee shop. Easy parking and check in experience. We enjoyed our stay and would recommend to others.

This was our second stay at this place. It’s located right down town with tons of cool shops. The place has a cool urban feel and the bedroom is in a cave with no windows which is perfect for sleeping in. The place is clean with no clutter and we hope to stay a third time. Some outside noise while in the living area but nothing out of the ordinary in a downtown loft. Cool place and a great overnight place to stay with your pup.
Place was dope!
Great host!
Super super cute place. Close to a lot of a good places to eat.
Great host and stay!
Great place to stay. We will definitely be back in the area visiting family so if it's available we will stay again. Very clean spacious apartment.
Loved the downtown apartment & would definitely stay again!!

This was a comfortable stay at a centrally located apartment. I loved the location--upstairs in a renovated, downtown building. Parking and getting to and into the apartment is easy. It was pleasant to walk to coffee shops in the morning and eat at the downstairs restaurant in the evening. Driving from downtown Sanford to attractions including in Pinehurst and Southern Pines was convenient. Thank you for a pleasant stay!
Jeff was a great host. Responded in a timely fashion and was flexible with check in. I would stay here again if in the area another time.
You will feel right at home at Jeff’s place and it has everything that you need. Walking distance to local restaurants, music, and entertainment.
A very cute apartment right in the middle of downtown Sanford. Everything was just right and the apartment is very spacious.
This great for a single person looking for a place to stay in Sanford.
Jeff’s place was a beautiful and perfect get away for my fiancé and I! We loved the looking out the windows and just watching the life of the world below us.

We were in the area visiting our first grandchild and everything about our stay was fantastic. This was the perfect place for us to stay for the the week. The location is central to downtown with shops/restaurants but also peaceful and quiet. Some may be concerned about being above a restaurant/bar would be a problem for late night noise, but we didn't hear a thing. It was nice to have a kitchen, central air, and a washer and dryer, as well. Jeff was a wonderful host, answering our questions during the week in a prompt manner. We can't say enough about our stay-- we highly recommend it!
Everything about this place was amazing! We loved it here and will be back every few weeks for school! Cute little downtown apartment!

Only stayed for one night, but had a stress-free check-in and check out. The apartment was exactly as photographed and described. If you want to turn in very early the restaurant and bar downstairs might be the only drawback. Not an issue for me and was expected since the bar was listed in the description. Would absolutely stay again if I am back in the area for another golf trip.
Location was perfect and apartment was super cool. Light and bright
Great place and great host!!

Super cute and affordable apartment within easy walking distance of several restaurants and coffee shops as well as driving distance to some phenomenal restaurants. Absolutely loved the uniqueness and character of this renovated building and would love to stay again in the future!
Jeff was very responsive and described the place perfectly. The photos were very accurate and the place was spotless! I would stay here again!!

This downtown apartment is in the perfect location for shopping, dining and sight-seeing.
Jeff's place is spacious and clean with interesting furnishings and a rustic urban vibe. Sanford is a quiet little town, we were there for a wedding and spent one day exploring nearby Pinehurst.
I highly recommend this Airbnb.
I was able book quick and affordable for a funeral in town. I’d def book again under happier circumstances so I can visit family

This was one of our fav places we have stayed. The place was perfect for us and our dog on an overnight stay over. Very roomy space and located right downtown, walkable to lots of shops and restaurants. Even though it was a small town, with the windows and feel of the place, it felt like an urban loft. We came over a holiday weekend, and so it was quiet because no one else was in the other apartments and the restaurant downstairs was closed…so it was very quiet during our stay. Very spacious and we loved the bedroom with no one windows, so we slept well. Hope to stay here again.

Right in town, plenty of walkable places to eat, shopping, coffee, super great location to everything in and around town. Everything was as described, very clean, older charm but up modern updates and amenities. I was in town on business and would stay again if available for future visits.
Great location right in the downtown area. We enjoyed our stay and will be back!
This was great place to stay while in Sanford!
Such a cool place to stay! Loved Sanford and loved this place!

jeff’s place was just as advertised, and we had a great stay. The smoke and barrel restaurant down below has great food, live music, and a staff that hustles. There’s lots to do right on the same street and on Thursdays, they have a concert two blocks away. This is a great apartment in great location for a great price.
Clean, secure, and nice.
loved the spot! Super clean and convenient.
Gorgeous condo! Very spacious, clean and cozy. Would definitely stay again!
We had a great stay! Very nice place, we enjoyed shopping and dining in downtown Sanford, and it was convenient to Carver's Creek and Raven Rock State Parks where we hiked, as well as Fort Bragg.
Love this place. Our second time staying here. We’ll definitely stay again.

Terrific stay in every way. Perfect spot as we were attending a family wedding at Oakland Farms.
Enjoyed dining and live music at Smoke and Barrel below the apartment.
If you need a taxi, call Chill Wheels. I left a review on yelp. Great guy. Extremely reliable and we kept safe back and forth to the wedding venue.
Great place! I'll be back
Jeff's place was clean and comfortable and walking distance to many different bars and restaurants. We felt very safe! Definitely will be back for another ladies night!
Great place to stay for a quick weekend!
We stayed at this location since my son lives in Sanford. It was centrally located, clean, beautifully decorated and Jeff was great in communication.

Really enjoyed staying here. Location is excellent. The apartment is very clean and uncluttered. My only caveat, is the live music from the restaurant below on Friday night it’s not easy to sleep before 11pm. Regardless, I would stay here again.

Great apartment and location, enjoyed the layout. Such a better option than a hotel suite.
One caveat, restaurant below has music Friday and Saturday nights and you can actually hear the words well enough to sing along from bed.
If you go to bed before midnight, use your phone as a white noise machine or something to drown out the sound and you’ll be fine.
Great places to stay in Sanford North Carolina.
Jeff was really kind and was helpful. The place was just like the pictures!
It was a super place in a great location . You could walk to restaurants or just get coffee. Temple Theater is down the street if they have a show. It was very quiet and we had a enjoyable stay.
Awesome apartment to stay in! Very large space for home, and extremely well kept. Would highly recommend for travelers!
Amazing place. Had everything you needed as for basics. Convenient location near local shops. Would definitely stay again!
Another perfect stay!
Another great stay!
Such a cool place!!
I'll definitely return!
Great little apartment for a stay in Sanford. Kitchen and living area was a great place to relax and feel like a home away from home.
Jeff responded quickly when messages were sent to him he was very polite and very helpful. Our stay was great
This place was perfect for us, with gorgeous windows to see downtown Sanford below. Everything in the apartment was so nice and I would recommend a stay here to anybody!
Very clean and spacious apartment.
Highly recommend.
Awesome apartment in downtown. Easy to get to and super convenient. The apartment was clean and nicely furnished.
Just stayed for the night but it was above a real neat bar. Nice place, Jeff was helpful and it was painless to get in and out. Would def recommend if you find yourself needing a base in Sanford!

It was a perfectly wonderful experience. The condo is furnished so beautifully and was so comfortable with every convenience. It was as comfortable as home. Would definitely like to revisit the next time I'm in Sanford. Jeff was a great host, very friendly and communicated so clearly. Very easy and enjoyable experience. Thank you, Jeff!
Excellent stay in a great location, very clean and comfortable!

Great experience! Best stay away from home yet. The condo is tastefully furnished with high quality appliances and lovely decor. The rooms are extremely spacious and the space was immaculately clean with lots of natural light. The bedroom was cozy and comfortable and allowed sound, restorative sleep! I was concerned that the restaurant downstairs might be noisy but it was surprisingly quiet! Location was perfect, close to work and restaurants and parks and greenway. Hope to return on my next work trip!
Great place in the heart of Sanford with lots of space. Jeff was easy to communicate with and checking in was very easy.
Perfect location, great host and communication, will try to come here again for sure

Really great all around! The pictures didn’t do the home justice. The light coming in from the windows really made it look much more beautiful. Very clean when we came and Jeff was very quick to answer when I had questions. If you choose to stay here be aware it’s in a bit of a city so I saw maybe a critter or two but nothing that would warrant caution about cleanliness. There’s a bar downstairs so it makes sense. Such a great spot! Only minor downside is how thin the walls were so you could very clearly hear the people in the apartment next door. All in all I was very happy with the place!

We were able to snag this cute apartment for a festival in downtown Sanford. We loved that we were within walking distance to shops, food and bars. We had late night beverages and got food to go at Smoke and Barrel, the restaurant/bar below the apartment. The view looking over the downtown area was fantastic and worked in our favor for the firework display that night. We were very please and excited to book again!
Jeff is a great host! The apartment was just like pictured, the bed was comfy and the location is perfect for my work trips to Sanford. I will definitely stay again.
Spacious downtown space. Big windows, well-appointed living area, and nice kitchen too! I'd definitely stay again.

A wonderful stay and loved the convenient location! The bar was loud underneath us but that was to be expected and we didn’t mind at all! It was a very large and spacious place and we loved the decor!
Great spot! Jeff was a great communicative host and check in was a breeze!
This is a truly beautiful and comfortable apartment in the heart of downtown Sanford.
Great place to stay in Sanford! Very spacious, great location, comfy living space. We had our infant daughter and the bedroom was nice and dark for her naps. Would definitely stay again!
Everything was great! Super clean, easy check in- loved the decor-super comfortable. Very walkable to cute boutiques and some good food options… thanks a bunch

Cannot say enough great things about this Airbnb! It exceeded our expectations and we had an amazing time! Was very clean, spacious and homey! We were in town to coordinate a wedding and this little place made our trip!

We absolutely loved this apartment. Very clean and easy to get around the area. Many walking places to go to. Would definitely rent again if I were in the area.
I would recommend the restaurant below, Smoke and Barrel, also La Dolce Pizzeria and end your evening with a stroll to Yarborough’s for home made ice cream.
I give it a 5 out of 5.
Great place, great restaurant downstairs.
Super nice apt. Very clean! Very attentive host! Great location! Look forward to a return visit soon!!
No issues besides check in. Resolved within minutes, highly recommended.
lovely apartment in the perfect location if you are staying in sanford... all the appliances you could possibly need. Huge space and good value... thanks to Jeff

To start off with, loved the location. The little bar under the apartment had a great craft beer selection, Jeff was extremely descriptive as to where to park so I didn't have to haul my girl's fifty bags too far. I loved how meticulously clean everything was and the decor as well as the big windows they made the place feel as spacious as it was. Overall an amazing experience, would recommend to any friend or family staying in Sanford or to anybody who reads these things.
This is a beautiful apartment with such a fantastic location and Jeff made check in simple easy very helpful !
Very cool renovation you have here. Looks like it was done right to me. Thanks for letting us stay.
Fantastic space with tons of character. Super clean, easy to get to, plenty of room. Wonderful host!

This place is so beautiful with so much character. It was extremely clean and had everything we needed. We loved that it was right downtown and walking distance to restaurants, farmers market, and shops. The only thing that was a challenge is the walls are thin so you can sometimes hear the neighbors.
Regardless, I would definitely book again if in the area.
Immaculate apartment, everything just as advertised. Jeff was very communicative and great!
Great Rental! Jeff was awesome and the apartment was beautiful and comfortable. Super convenient to downtown. Looking forward to staying here again during future business trips.
Great, clean and convenient place to stay right downtown. Jeff is awesome with communication. Would stay there again.
Perfect location downtown Sanford, NC
Had a great time for a quick weekend away in Sanford. Good location, fast communication from the Host and a very clean apartment.
A comfortable and open space that was perfect to walk into after driving for four hours. Spacious and bright with a great location right in town

A beautiful, quaint cottage.
Very tastefully, updated, clean, great shower water pressure!
Host communicated very well, checking in on us during our visit and making sure we were comfortable.
A thank you card and gift was left for us upon arrival which was so very sweet!
Host a welcome book with, restaurant suggestions and even a thorough description of the wildlife surrounding the cottage at water’s edge.
It was a really peaceful weekend staycation!
If you love nature, want a peaceful retreat, we would recommend!
We had a very peaceful and relaxing time at the cottage!

This place is awesome .Beautiful view and very unique house very clean inside and out . Eunice was very responsive and worked with us on checking in . Eunice was very friendly always answering any questions i had.Our family enjoyed this place so much great fishing right off the deck .It rained everyday we were there but it was very relaxing watching the rain on the lake right on the deck. We will definitely go back in the future .Thanks so much for our stay the perfect secluded get away for a family or a couple so peaceful and relaxing 😌.
Perfect little blue house out on the water!

Eunice’s cottage is beautiful, clean, and modern. The covered deck right on the water was perfect for relaxing, listening to nature, and getting plenty of fresh air. It was raining heavy one night and sitting out there watching the storm roll over the lake was such a good vibe! Eunice was an excellent host as well, very friendly, great with communication and instructions.

My mom and I had a great stay here! Everything was nicely decorated, new, and clean. The beds were really comfy as well. We are looking forward to staying here again next time we’re visiting this area!

We had a great stay at this cottage- our toddler loved it and thought that we had permanently moved to “the lake house.” We had fun taking out the canoe and relaxing on the big porch, and everything was super clean and seemed newly updated. We didn’t realize there wasn’t an oven but that’s on us for not reading carefully. We would definitely stay here again!
BEAUTIFUL STAY! So peaceful and incredible views. Wish we could have been there longer to enjoy. Will be back!
Super cute home. Quiet and beautiful views. We really enjoyed our stay!
It was a really nice peaceful place very clean and well taken care of.

Another amazing stay. This is our 3rd time here. As always the place is extremely clean and communicating with the owners is very ease. we love the views and the place. So peaceful.
What takes this place over the top of every other place we have stayed is the owners. I'm not sure too many owners would have done what they did this weekend. We checked in at 4:30 and the A/C wasn't working. I messaged the owner and in 45 minutes both the owner and their A/C guy was there. They determined the unit needed replaced and they would have the unit replaced in the morning. We were comfortable staying there because the sun was going down and it was cooling off. By 1030am the next morning a brand new unit was installed and we weren't inconvenienced at all. our next 3 days were nice and cool. They were very accommodating and professional. I highly recommend staying here as I'm not sure all owners would have handled this issue this way.

The photos don’t do this place justice- it is wonderful and peaceful. We spent hours just looking at the lake and listening to the frogs. The owners are lovely and have thought of everything you would need for a fantastic stay.
Fantastic place with great hosts! Would definitely stay again.
We were very pleased with the location and the country feel of the cottage!
This was our second stay. Always a pleasure staying at the Cottage!
I have stayed here before and it the best place ive stayed in. The view is amazing. The house is do nice. We just love the place

The cottage is quaintly decorated and it's located in a serene and peaceful environment. If you want to escape the hustle and bustle of life, this place will provide you with a perfect escape.
The host was super responsive to any questions that I had. She even offered to pick up the trash mid-week. I was impressed with my overall experience and I am definitely planning to return again.

Absolutely gorgeous cottage. Everything is top notch. Would definitely stay here again. Eunice answered all my questions within minutes. Highly recommend staying in this beautiful and quaint cottage. 5 🌟!

Ive stayed in alot of Airbnb places and this by far was the the most thought out. It was perfect in every way. The accommodations, the cleanliness, the location, the view and the amenities. This place is a must stay if you want a quite location with a great view

Was the place clean, safe, and secure?.... YES
Would I stay there again?.... probably YES
Some things you should know:
- It is rather secluded. You enter through a long private drive which can be a little eerie if coming in late at night.
- It was recently remodeled/decorated and they didn't skimp, it looks nice.
- The living area was a little small, but the walk out porch made up for it.
- Ample parking and very few neighbors
- Its definitely quiet but you do have some noisy neighbors (frogs)
Great place to stay, well stocked and clean place, Heide was so nice and easy to talk to if we need anything, peaceful place
cozy and very welcoming place. quiet and serene. definitely recommend!
Love, love, love this place. We have stayed here before. Everything is perfect. We love Heidi. She is always so welcoming and friendly. We will return again.
I had a great stay at Heidi’s! It was very peaceful.
Heidi's home was just perfect for the two of us in town to work for a weekend. Hope to come back. She was great at communication and everything was very comfortable and easy.

STAY HERE! You owe it to yourself! So cozy and comforting. Don’t stay at a hotel- STAY HERE! The photos are absolutely accurate but they don’t do it justice! One reviewer says it was “jaw dropping” and I absolutely agree. My family are Sanford locals and they were impressed. Their first words upon entry: “mmmm smells like the beach!”. Heidi definitely cut no corners in this apartment and we had everything we needed and more! Water and sodas in the fridge, snacks on the table, coffee pods ready to go! Plenty of clean linens and towels. Comfy couch and BIG TV! We brought our golden doodle and she got a warm welcome too AND she loved it as well! I wish we were staying longer because it was hard to say goodbye to this amazing space! We definitely are coming back to stay with Heidi ❤️ THANK YOU HEIDI!

"Honestly, this stay was a bit jaw-dropping -- most things were way better than we expected. The place itself is clean and spacious, has lots of snacks and cokes, the beds are big, and it even has a flexible showerhead. Moreover, the location is great -- it's green and blossoming, quiet, but just a few minutes from downtown Sanford. I'm sure Heidi does this from her heart."
Heidi’s place very welcoming and clean ! It was a fantastic stay , she had great hospitality and was very accommodating. Would definitely stay again ⭐️⭐️
Great host, very nice place!
My time at Heidi’s was amazing! It was very clean and peaceful!
It was a great and quiet trip!
Always an amazing time at Heidi’s!
This was our second stay at Heidi's, and once again, the stay was comfortable and enjoyable!
I had a great stay at Heidi’s! It feels like a home away from home!
Heidi’s place was amazing! It was a very quiet stay! I loved the theme of the house!
I had an amazing time!

We were here about a year ago and were very grateful to be able to come back with our dogs. Heidi is an amazing host and we always have a great time visiting with her and staying at her place. She always has snacks and drinks in the fridge. Place is so quiet and a great fenced in area for the dogs. We highly recommend it!
